title: Russia declares Navalny's groups 'extremist' in ongoing crackdown -lawyers
content:
1. Russia declares Navalny's groups 'extremist' in ongoing crackdown -lawyers  Reuters
  2. With a Ban on Navalny's Group, Putin Sends a Message to Biden  The New York Times
  3. Russian court outlaws opposition leader's groups, Navalny vows not to 'retreat'  FRANCE 24 English
  4. Navalny's daughter confronts kremlin, says Kremlin can't silence its critics | Daria Navalnaya |WION  WION
  5. Russia: Moscow court labels pro-Navalny organizations 'extremist'  DW (English)
